summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3562, for the improvement of Taylor Avenue from Roy Street to the north margin of Prospect Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44299, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
